title: create task summary upon completion that gest shown in history > task detail
summary: Explored approaches for generating task completion summaries with rich context
Proposed using existing completion reports and AI to create detailed JSON summaries
keyChanges: UX concept for task history details

suggestedTasks.title: Prototype AI-powered Task Summary Generator
suggestedTasks.description: Create a proof-of-concept that uses language models to generate structured task summaries from raw completion data

suggestedTasks.title: Design Task History Detail View
suggestedTasks.description: Create UI mockups for the new task detail view that incorporates generated summaries

patterns: Using structured completion reports as input for summary generation
Leveraging small language models for contextual summarization
gotchas: Ensuring privacy and data security when processing task details
Maintaining consistent summary quality across different task types
